price: Sesungguhnya Kami mewarisi bumi 904 dan semua orang-orang yang ada di atasnya dan hanya kepada Kamilah mereka dikembalikan.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: 904.  Maksud "mewarisi bumi"  adalah setelah alam semesta ini hancur semuanya, maka Allah-lah yang kekal.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
